data.text:
Q. Which of the following award winning films has no dialogues?

Answer: Pushpak

Notes: Pushpaka Vimana is a 1987 Indian black comedy film written and directed by Singeetam Srinivasa Rao. The film has no dialogue was produced by Singeetam Srinivasa Rao and Shringar Nagaraj, starring Kamal Haasan, Amala in leading role.

8

The above question is part of 35000+ General Studies MCQ Series Course on GKToday Android app.
